description: It's easy to cook the best pork belly and crispy pork crackling in an air fryer with this recipe. Balance the pork perfectly with our fresh mandarin salad.
keywords: Air-Fryer Crispy Pork Belly With Mandarin Salad
name: Air-Fryer Crispy Pork Belly With Mandarin Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Just before serving, toss mandarin, rocket, onion and fennel in a large bowl. Serve sliced pork with salad drizzled with mustard dressing
Just before serving, toss mandarin, rocket, onion and fennel in a large bowl. Serve sliced pork with salad drizzled with mustard dressing
